description:
The MTG banlist covers every card that’s illegal to play (or restricted to a limited number of copies) in a constructed Magic: The Gathering deck. This guide can tell you the details from the latest Magic banlist update, and it features every banlist for every format. If you have banlist questions, we can answer them.

We also have a separate guide to the MTG Commander banlist, if that’s the only one you’re interested in. For all other Magic players, read on for every banned card from all the MTG sets so far.

Con
title: MTG banlist updates and announcements

description:
Clank!, an excellent deck building board game all about nabbing treasure and pushing your luck, has finally been adapted into a fully-featured digital edition. Developed by the studio Dire Wolf, Clank! is on sale on Steam, Google Play, and the Apple app store now.

Continue reading One of the best deck building board games is finally on PC and mobile
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best board games , Couples' board games,
title: One of the best deck building board games is finally on PC and mobile

description:
Though you will have to wait a little while until the best Black Friday Lego deals start to appear, the sale season will be here before you know it. Once the bargains start appearing, we'll head out into the online shops, and squirrel away all the deals away before curating them here on this page.

While there's much to be admired about the best cheap Lego sets, you have to admit that it's a lot nicer to get the more expensive ones at a low price. Many of the best Lego sets for adults carry massive price tags, but during Black Friday season, you can often see them
title: Best Lego deals ahead of Black Friday 2024

description:
Magic: The Gathering publisher Wizards of the Coast has announced the forming of a 17-person Commander Format Panel, to offer advice, provide feedback, raise issues and generally help the company manage Magic’s most popular, profitable format.

Continue reading MTG’s new Commander Panel urged to “disagree loudly” with Wizards
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order,
title: MTG’s new Commander Panel urged to “disagree loudly” with Wizards

description:
For decades, Warhammer 40k has held the crown as the most bleak, bloody, and grimdark setting in all of tabletop wargaming. But it’s in danger of losing that crown to Trench Crusade, a new skirmish game torn from the nightmare visions of concept artist Mike Franchina.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k has nothing as scary as these Trench Crusade demons
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Guide to Warhammer 40k factions,
title: Warhammer 40k has nothing as scary as these Trench Crusade demons
